entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] CollectionView HeightRequest Editor dynamic sizing is broken #22651
  • Flyout shown for a moment when interacting with a backbutton in Android Shell #22649
  • [iOS] Work through how iOS propagates SetNeedsLayout #22647
    9.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Remove workaround for label text decorations #22650
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf

Updated

  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
